name: astonish
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
An attack that may shock
the foe into flinching.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
An attack that may shock
the foe into flinching.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An attack using a
startling shout.
It also may make
the foe flinch.

The user attacks the
foe while shouting in
a startling fashion.
It may also make the
target flinch.
